task.title: Search by Using XSLT Match Patterns

context.p: To perform narrower searches with complex criteria, e.g. search for certain values of certain attributes of certain elements, use special XSLT match patterns. XSLT match patterns match against elements that satisfy specific conditions.

step.cmd: Specify the XSLT match pattern to search with.

info.p: In the Find field, enter an XSLT match pattern.

fig.title: Find tab. XSLT match pattern to search with is entered.

step.cmd: Select the XSLT pattern search type.

info.p: To do a search using the XSLT match pattern entered in the Find field, select XSLT Pattern from the Search drop-down list.

fig.title: Find tab. Select the search by using XSLT Pattern .
